biotools.summary: X-CAP is a GBT model that predicts the pathogenicity of single-nucleotide stopgain variants. This repository contains the trained model as well as code to run X-CAP on a VCF file of variants.

bioschemas.name: X-CAP
bioschemas.summary: X-CAP is a GBT model that predicts the pathogenicity of single-nucleotide stopgain variants. This repository contains the trained model as well as code to run X-CAP on a VCF file of variants.
